PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-07802014-06-13,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActNational Energy Board Act
PrecisReappointment of LYNE MERCIER of Calgary, Alberta, as a member of the National Energy Board to hold office during good behaviour, on a full-time basis, for a term of seven years, effective December 17,2015; and designation of LYNE MERCIER of Calgary, Alberta, as the Vice-Chairperson of the National Energy Board for a term ending on December 16, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
